title: Google\Cloud\GkeHub\V1beta1\ConnectAgent
name: ConnectAgent
description:
The information required from end users to use GKE Connect.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gkehub.v1beta1.ConnectAgent

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.proxy
params.description: Optional. URI of a proxy if connectivity from the agent to gkeconnect.googleapis.com requires the use of a proxy. Format must be in the form http(s)://{proxy_address}, depending on the HTTP/HTTPS protocol supported by the proxy. This will direct the connect agent's outbound traffic through a HTTP(S) proxy.

params.name: data.namespace
params.description: Optional. Namespace for GKE Connect agent resources. Defaults to gke-connect. The Connect Agent is authorized automatically when run in the default namespace. Otherwise, explicit authorization must be granted with an additional IAM binding.

methods.name: getName
methods.description:
Do not set.
